title: Kami no CAVEIRA
description:
Inspired by the constant and violent confrontation between BOPE and crime in the "favelas" (shanty towns) of Rio de Janeiro. The story focuses on a recent member of BOPE who began to question the methods used by his leader.

[hr][b][u]Português / Portuguese:[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Tobias é um recruta do BOPE que tem seus ideais postos a prova quando vê seu Capitão, Shindo, fazendo de tudo para cumprir as missões.[/spoiler]
